thread.title: Re: You get NOTHING: Ben Shapiro entitled to reimbursement from family of Ahmed ‘Clock Kid’ Mohamed
thread.title_full: Re: You get NOTHING: Ben Shapiro entitled to reimbursement from family of Ahmed ‘Clock Kid’ Mohamed

author: Donald-Now 3x as Deplorable
title: Re: You get NOTHING: Ben Shapiro entitled to reimbursement from family of Ahmed ‘Clock Kid’ Mohamed
text:
You get NOTHING: Ben Shapiro entitled to reimbursement from family of Ahmed ‘Clock Kid’ Mohamed Posted at 7:09 pm on February 2, 2017 by Brett T. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
As Twitchy reported, the family of Ahmed Mohamed, the teen who dazzled Barack Obama with his “cool clock,” last fall filed a lawsuit demanding apologies and on-air retractions from a list of pundits and politicians including Fox News, Glenn Beck and The Blaze, Daily Wire Editor-in-Chief Ben Shapiro, and Irving Mayor Beth Van Duyne. 
Things did not go well for the plaintiffs at a hearing in January, and Shapiro lowered the boom Thursday by posting a court order dismissing the suit against him. 
— Ben Shapiro (@benshapiro) February 2, 2017 Ben Shapiro Crushes Clock Boy in Court https://t.co/kQByzjs0m4 
— Kurt Schlichter (@KurtSchlichter) February 2, 2017 Trending
